DOC.brief_summary: Light Endoscopic Robot evaluation in abdominal and urological laparoscopic surgery : surgery with surgeon and robot (REL group = new treatment) versus surgery with surgeon and assistant (AO group - standard treatment) Primary outcome measure : Number of useful hands (light endoscopic robot = one useful mechanical hand)
DOC.brief_title: Light Endoscopic Robot Use in Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopic surgery indicated Subject with ASA Score 1, 2 or 3 Subject with health and social protection 18 years of age or older Written Informed Consent Subject is pregnant or lactating Subject in jail Subject hospitalizes without consent Protected persons aged 18 years or older Subject participated in another study
